snippet.title: Zombie State | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
🕹 PLAY Zombie State ▶︎ https://zombiestate.my.games/

Zombie State is a fresh FPS shooter game with a roguelike twist.

Dark days bring new challenges, so it's time to arm yourself for immersive action-packed gameplay. Step into an infected world full of monsters and experience the fear of the apocalypse in first-person. Use different combinations of character special abilities to turn the tide against the zombie hordes. Complete missions to unlock a variety of unique weapons. Explore the secrets of a city plagued by the undead and take on new challenges.

Are you brave enough to face the undead? Prove yourself in Zombie State now! 🧟‍♂️🎯
______
Discord: join the community
▶︎  https://discord.gg/FHrDX4h5mq

Facebook
▶︎  https://www.facebook.com/ZombieStateGame

Twitter | X
▶︎  https://twitter.com/ZST_game
